rewrite1:
Please make the following changes to the document:

- In paragraph six, please update the Outline Level to Level 2 and alter the line spacing to 1 centimeter.
  
- In paragraph nine, switch the Outline Level to 6, increase the font size to 36 points, apply a heavy wave underline, and set a right indent of 2 centimeters.

- For paragraph three, adjust the line spacing to Multiple with a factor of 3 lines. Also, set the space after the paragraph to be equivalent to 3 lines, apply a dotted underline, and format the text in italics.

- The ninth paragraph requires several adjustments: set the Outline Level to 6, increase the font size to 36 points, choose a heavy wave style for underlining, and establish a right indent of 2 centimeters.

rewrite3:
For the sixth paragraph, please update the Outline Level to Level 2 and alter the line spacing to be 1 centimeter.

Moving on to the ninth paragraph, assign Outline Level 6 and increase the font size to 36 points. Additionally, choose the heavy wave style for underlining and implement a right indent of 2 centimeters.

Regarding the third paragraph, adjust the line spacing to Multiple with a factor of 3 lines, and set the spacing after the paragraph to also be 3 lines. Apply a dotted underline for emphasis, and format the text in italics.
